name: Tower Technologies
description: Tower Technologies (Pvt.) Limited (TTL) is a well-established IT company with over 225 man years of experience in software systems design and development. It is incorporated under the Companies Ordinance 1984 and has been operating since 2001 as part of a larger conglomerate of private limited companies commonly referred to as The Punjab Group.

locations.address: Arfa Software Technology Park, 346-B, Ferozepur Road
